---
title: "SPP for LPZ"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
LPZ <- read_csv("~/R/SPP/CSV/LPZ.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
lpz <- ts(LPZ[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+128/365.25)
lpz %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(lpz))
```

```{r}
training_lpz <- subset(lpz, end=length(lpz)-4)
test_lpz <- subset(lpz, start=length(lpz)-3)
fc_training_lpz<-forecast(training_lpz)
fc_training_lpz %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_lpz)
```

```{r}
fc_training_lpz
```

```{r}
fc_lpz<-forecast(lpz)
fc_lpz %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_lpz
```

```{r}
accuracy(fc_lpz)
```

tail(lpz)
min(lpz)
max(lpz)
which.min(lpz)
